nodes.text: Tallov Kersk was a Human male settler and farmer on the planet Muzara. He came to the planet with his family—his wife, his brother-in-law Karn, his sister, his son Vettle, and his niece Cavvie—in 4000 BBY. Tallov Kersk and his family became the first settlers from the Brentaal League to encounter the planet's native species, the Muza. Kersk ordered his son to retrieve the blaster rifles for their encounter.
